annual_consecutivedrydays.long_name: Annual maximum number of consecutive days with precipitation <=0.2mm

annual_consecutivewetdays.long_name: Annual maximum number of consecutive days with precipitation >= 10mm

annual_coolingdegreedays.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days

annual_growingdegreedays.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days

annual_heatingdegreedays.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days

annual_max10dayprecipitation.cell_methods: time: sum (interval: 10 days)   time: maximum over days
annual_max10dayprecipitation.long_name: Annual maximum precipitation amount (mm) for 10 standard rain days (09 to 09 UTC)

annual_max1dayprecipitation.cell_methods: time: sum (interval: 1 day)   time: maximum over days
annual_max1dayprecipitation.long_name: Annual maximum precipitation amount (mm) for 1 standard rain day (09 to 09 UTC)

annual_max2dayprecipitation.cell_methods: time: sum (interval: 2 days)   time: maximum over days
annual_max2dayprecipitation.long_name: Annual maximum precipitation amount (mm) for 2 standard rain days (09 to 09 UTC)

annual_max5dayprecipitation.cell_methods: time: sum (interval: 5 day)   time: maximum over days
annual_max5dayprecipitation.long_name: Annual maximum precipitation amount (mm) for 5 consecutive days during the year

annual_maxtemp.cell_methods: time: maximum within days   time: mean over days
annual_maxtemp.long_name: Annual mean of daily maximum air temperature

annual_meantemp.cell_methods: time: mid_range within days   time: mean over days

annual_mintemp.cell_methods: time: minimum within days   time: mean over days
annual_mintemp.long_name: Annual mean of daily minimum air temperature

annual_radiation.long_name: Annual total global solar radiation amount

annual_raindays90percentile.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days
annual_raindays90percentile.long_name: Annual number of rain days with precipitation that exceed the 1961-1990 90th percentile.

annual_raindays99percentile.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days
annual_raindays99percentile.long_name: Annual number of rain days with precipitation that exceed the 1961-1990 99th percentile.

annual_rainfall90precentile.long_name: Annual 90th percentile of daily precipitation amount (mm)

annual_rainfall99precentile.long_name: Annual 99th percentile of daily precipitation amount (mm)

annual_rainfallintensity.long_name: Total precipitation on days with ≥1 mm divided by count of days with ≥1 mm during the year

annual_rainprop90percentile.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days
annual_rainprop90percentile.long_name: Annual proportion (%) of precipitation total from events that exceed the 1961-1990 90th percentile.

annual_rainprop99percentile.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days
annual_rainprop99percentile.long_name: Annual proportion (%) of precipitation total from events that exceed the 1961-1990 99th percentile.

annual_sunshine.long_name: Annual total duration of bright sunshine

daily_maxtemp.cell_methods: time: maximum (observing period is 0900 on day D to 0900 on day D+1)

daily_mintemp.cell_methods: time: minimum (observing period is 0900 on day D-1 to 0900 on day D)

monthly_airfrost.cell_methods: time: minimum within days   time: sum over days
monthly_airfrost.long_name: Number of days in the month with air frost (minimum temperature below zero)

monthly_grassmin.cell_methods: time: minimum within days   time: mean over days
monthly_grassmin.long_name: Monthly mean of daily minimum grass temperature

monthly_groundfrost.cell_methods: time: minimum within days   time: sum over days
monthly_groundfrost.long_name: Number of days in the month with ground frost (minimum grass temperature below zero)

monthly_maxtemp.cell_methods: time: maximum within days   time: mean over days
monthly_maxtemp.long_name: Monthly mean of daily maximum air temperature

monthly_maxtemp_climatology.cell_methods: time: maximum within days   time: mean over days   time: mean over years
monthly_maxtemp_climatology.long_name: Long-term average of daily maximum air temperature

monthly_meantemp.cell_methods: time: mid_range within days   time: mean over days

monthly_mintemp.cell_methods: time: minimum within days   time: mean over days
monthly_mintemp.long_name: Monthly mean of daily minimum air temperature

monthly_mintemp_climatology.cell_methods: time: maximum within days   time: mean over days   time: mean over years
monthly_mintemp_climatology.long_name: Long-term average of daily minimum air temperature

monthly_radiation.long_name: Monthly total global solar radiation amount

monthly_raindays0.2mm.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days
monthly_raindays0.2mm.long_name: Number of days in the month with precipitation amount >= 0.2mm

monthly_raindays10mm.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days
monthly_raindays10mm.long_name: Number of days in the month with precipitation amount >= 10mm

monthly_raindays1mm.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days
monthly_raindays1mm.long_name: Number of days in the month with precipitation amount >= 1mm

monthly_rainfallreturnperiod.long_name: Return period of monthly total precipitation amount

monthly_snowfalling.cell_methods: time: sum within days   time: sum over days (applies only to precipitation falling as sleet or snow)
monthly_snowfalling.long_name: Number of days in the month with sleet or snow falling

monthly_snowlying.long_name: Number of days in the month with snow lying at 0900

monthly_soiltemp30cm.long_name: Monthly mean of daily soil temperature at 30cm depth at 0900

monthly_sunshine.long_name: Monthly total duration of bright sunshine

seasonal_consecutivewetdays.long_name: Seasonal maximum number of consecutive days with precipitation >= 10mm
